docs.text: DENOG Routing Guide This guide is intended to act as a reference for best practices in Internet backbone routing. Its goal is to make the Internet more stable, secure and sustainable by educating both new and experienced network engineers. Working Group This guide is edited by the DENOG Routing Working Group. You don't need to be a member of the working group to contribute to the project. Contribute You can contribute to this routing guide on github.com/denog/routing-guide/ using GitHubs issues or pull request features. We have a Code of Conduct as a common ground for collaboration.
